Definition.WordDefinition: Monrovia, CA (city, FIPS 48648) Location: 34.16338 N, 117.99042 W Population (1990): 35761 (13944 housing units) Area: 34.6 sq km (land), 0.2 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 91016 Monrovia, IN Zip code(s): 46157 Monrovia, MD Zip code(s): 21770
Monrovia n : the capital and chief port and largest city of Liberia [syn: {Liberian capital}, {capital of Liberia}]
